definition: to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
he or him/(used for either sex when the sex is unknown or unimportant)/(used before sb's name for emphasis)/(used as a meaningless mock object)/other/another
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: There was clearly nothing left to do but flop down on the shabby little couch and howl.
sentences.chinese: 除了撲到破舊的小沙發裏嚎哭顯然別無他法。

sentences.english: Machine try a part to have no other way besides much exercise.
sentences.chinese: 機試部分除了多練習別無他法。

sentences.english: We can do nothing but to love, and this makes us lonelier .
sentences.chinese: 我們別無他法，只能相愛，而這令我們更加孤獨。

sentences.english: None of this means that anxious smokers who want to stop are without recourse.
sentences.chinese: 以上這些都不能說明急切戒菸者想戒菸的話別無他法。

sentences.english: If that doesn’t make them take a step back, nothing will.
sentences.chinese: 如果這樣都不能使對方後退一點，那就別無他法了。

sentences.english: They’re all but done for unless they change their focus, Jobs said.
sentences.chinese: 喬布斯說，他們除了改變他們的重點，別無他法。

sentences.english: The rats have no choice but to let her try.
sentences.chinese: 老鼠們別無他法，只好讓她去試。

sentences.english: You can't get to the island other than by boat.
sentences.chinese: 要去那座島，除了搭船以外，別無他法。

sentences.english: Jason and Maggie had nothing to do but accepted the fact.
sentences.chinese: 詹森和麥姬別無他法，只好接受眼前的事實。
